help-file.title: "THROW LIGHTNING"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: N/A Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Generic
"Throw lightning" invokes the forces of nature to make lightning strike the intended victim. It is therefore only possible to cast this spell when you are outside and while it is raining (or worse), as the spell causes a massive bolt of lightning to hurl itself from the rain clouds overhead, striking the intended victim and causing considerable damage.
